meanings.definition: Destroying or inhibiting the growth of microorganisms
meanings.sent1: The antimicrobial spray helped keep the kitchen clean.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antimicrobial creams to prevent infections.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's antimicrobial shield protected the city from harmful germs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an antimicrobial barrier against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The antimicrobial properties of the soap made it a popular choice among health-conscious consumers.

meanings.definition: A substance that destroys or inhibits the growth of microorganisms
meanings.sent1: The hospital stocked up on antimicrobials to fight infections.
meanings.sent2: She always carries an antimicrobial in her bag for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The antimicrobial was so effective that even the bacteria were impressed.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against germs, the antimicrobial was the ultimate weapon.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovered a new antimicrobial that revolutionized medicine.
